news.title: Resident doctors in England vote for fresh strike action over pay
news.summary: The doctors' union says it will seek fresh talks with ministers before setting strike days.

news.title: Norman Tebbit, key Thatcher ally, dies aged 94
news.summary: The Conservative politician served in ministerial jobs throughout the 1980s.

news.title: Heat health alerts issued ahead of third UK heatwave
news.summary: Hot weather is forecast to return this week but to which locations and for how long?

news.title: Families demand answers ahead of Southport inquiry opening
news.summary: The inquiry will examine the lead up to the attack and the wider issue of extremist violence.

news.title: Pension triple lock to cost three times initial estimate
news.summary: The official forecaster warns public finances are in a "relatively vulnerable position" due U-turns.

news.title: Hamas used sexual violence as part of 'genocidal strategy', Israeli experts say
news.summary: The Dinah Project, an all-women group, lays out "a legal blueprint for prosecuting these crimes", which Hamas has denied committing.

news.title: Children in England living in 'Dickensian' levels of poverty, commissioner warns
news.summary: Children's Commissioner for England Dame Rachel de Souza says one told her "in the night rats came and bit his face".

news.title: Watch: 'This is a tragedy' - Texans pay respects to flood victims
news.summary: The death toll from the flash floods has now climbed to more than 100 people and an unknown number of others are missing.

news.title: 'Hero' dad, twin girls and riverside campers among victims
news.summary: At least 104 lives were lost after a rapid deluge in the centre of the US state on Friday.

news.title: Norman Tebbit: Outspoken hero of the Conservative political right
news.summary: Norman Tebbit's radical views on self-help kept him at the cutting edge of Conservative politics.
